name: Honey, I Might Be Late
description:
Running late for your wedding and happening upon a blazing fire, you call your spouse-to-be to tell them that there are obstacles in your way and you might be late. Your spouse-to-be will talk you through the situation but it is up to you to solve the problem. Collect polymer globs to form planks and crates to navigate the hazards of the city.

A 2.5 D sidescroller consisting of three levels in a city, divided by neighborhoods (residential, industrial, entertainment) and presenting various obstacles to the player. Build your solution cleverly, but beware - physics isn't always on your side!

Honey, I Might Be Late uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere

Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – xxxx, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

Made by Brian Howard, Dain Harmon, Han Murphy, and Gabriela Monroy.
